news.title: Camila Cabello takes 3Arena dancing with Yours, C Tour
news.summary: The show was her first performance in Dublin in seven years.

news.title: Wolf Alice release new single ahead of their upcoming album
news.summary: The new song can be heard below.

news.title: Oasis top the Irish Albums Chart as they kick off Live '25 tour
news.summary: Dublin's Croke Park will see the brothers for a double header on August 16 and 17

news.title: UNICEF exhibition of Palestinian photojournalism in Gaza to open in Dublin
news.summary: A Question Mark Hangs Over Gaza will open July 24.

news.title: Salvable soundtrack by David Keenan released
news.summary: Starring Shia LaBeouf and Toby Kebbell, the British boxing drama follows an ageing fighter dealing with battles both inside and outside the ring.

news.title: Album Review: Noah Cyrus, I Want My Loved Ones To Go With Me
news.summary: Second solo album from alt-country star. 7.5/10

news.title: Adebisi Shank to raffle off original artwork in aid of Irish Artists For Palestine
news.summary: All profits will be donated to Irish Artists For Palestine.

news.title: Justin Bieber drops new surpise album Swag
news.summary: The album spans just under an hour and features 20 tracks, including ‘Dadz Love,’ ‘Devotion,’ and ‘Therapy Session.’

news.title: Fionn Regan announces Dublin gig at 3Olympia Theatre
news.summary: Regan will embark on his Before The Avalanche tour in autumn, in support of his seventh studio album, O Avalanche
